messages.content: The Liberal Democrats are leading the fight against the Conservatives' extreme Brexit. The Conservatives want to drag Britain out of the single market, putting our jobs at risk. Jeremy Corbyn’s Labour Party have given Theresa May a blank cheque to pursue her hard Brexit. Only the Liberal Democrats want the British people to have the final say on Brexit when we know what Brexit looks like. Only a vote for the Liberal Democrats will send a clear message against the Conservatives' extreme Brexit.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A penny on income tax to fund NHS and social care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A penny on income tax to give the NHS and social care an extra £6bn a year.
Protecting pensions, the pensions triple lock.

issues.brexitEurope: The Liberal Democrats are leading the fight against the Conservatives' extreme Brexit. The Conservatives want to drag Britain out of the single market, putting our jobs at risk. issues.socialWelfare: Protecting pensions, the pensions triple lock.

leaflet.personalStatement: John entered BT’s Major Project Construction division 14 years ago, having joined as an apprentice. Since then, he’s been responsible for delivering projects costing over £300m and employing around 500 people. John lives in Forest Hill with his girlfriend. He spent 3 years as a volunteer youth mentor, helping unemployed young people to gain essential skills and find work. John’s experiences growing up in the South East, aged 12-21, prompted him to join the Liberal Democrats in 2003. John was part of Siddiq Khan’s campaign for John He has taken sabbaticals to work in the community and has always worked hard to get first-time voters registered. Elected to the board in 2015, he has been responsible for promoting entrepreneurs and small businesses in the area.

quotes.text: Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit.

examples: A penny on income tax to give the NHS and social care an extra £6bn a year.
